settings.title: How long does it take to process an order?
settings.content: Order processing times vary depending on the product and location. Typically, it takes 1-3 business days to process an order before it is shipped. You will receive a confirmation email with tracking details once your order has been dispatched.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.content: Yes, we offer international shipping! Delivery times and costs may vary depending on your location.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.content: Our return policy allows returns within [X] days of purchase, provided the item is unused and in its original packaging. Some exclusions may apply.

settings.title: What are your sizing options?
settings.content: We offer a variety of sizing options, ranging from [XS to XXL] (or custom sizes depending on the product). Please check our size chart for exact measurements.

settings.title: Do you offer custom sizing?
settings.content: Yes, we provide custom sizing for select products. Please contact our support team for more details.

settings.heading: Discover more in our FAQ
settings.description:
Have a question or comment? Don't be shy: Reach out and say hi!
Support hours: Monday-Friday, 7am-3pm
